int32_t Bsp_ar12xxComputeCrc (uint8_t *wMbDataBaseAdd, uint32_t hNBytes, uint8_t crcLen, uint8_t *outCrc)
 Computes CRC16-CCITT computation.
The mailbox data is is read 64bits (8 bytes) at one shot using LDMA instruction to reduce the access time, each bytes of the message is passed to LUT based CRC algorithm.
. More...

Function Documentation

◆ Bsp_ar12xxComputeCrc()

int32_t Bsp_ar12xxComputeCrc ( uint8_t *  wMbDataBaseAdd,
uint32_t  hNBytes,
uint8_t  crcLen,
uint8_t *  outCrc 
)

Computes CRC16-CCITT computation.
The mailbox data is is read 64bits (8 bytes) at one shot using LDMA instruction to reduce the access time, each bytes of the message is passed to LUT based CRC algorithm.
.

Parameters
[in]wMbDataBaseAdd- The message data source base address
[in]hNBytes- Num of bytes to read for CRC computation
[in]crcLen- Length/Type of CRC
[in]outCrc- Pointer to CRC output buffer
Returns
int Success - 0, Failure - Error Code

◆ TDAregisterCallback()

STATUS TDAregisterCallback ( UINT8  devSelection,
EVENT_HANDLER  RF_EventCallback,
void *  pValue 
)

Parameters
